ebawin aanduwa wisin genayana mema prajathanthra wirodhi wadapiliwelata erehiwa janathawa, wruththiya samithi, madhya sanwidhana, aagamika sanwidhana saha deshapalana paksha danuwath kirimata saha mema aragalayata owun sambandha karaganima sandaha katayuthu karana bawada hethema pawasiya.me sambandhayen shishya ayithin uduraganimata erehiwa adhikarana kriyamarga ganimatath, des wides manawa himikam aayathana, thanapathi karyala saha eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya danuwath kirimatath anthar wishwawidyalayiya shishya balamandalaya katayuthu karana bawada sanjiwa bandara mahatha wadiduratath pawasiya.
